Fenrick's Slated MR monsters-A lesson to be learned
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Shrine Topics: CDs & Slating: Fenrick's Slated MR monsters-A lesson to be learned
By MrMatt on Sunday, August 12, 2001 - 06:48 pm:

From slating Fenrick's MR monsters, we have discovered that the MR2 game detects the sharked monsters. Even though in the MR game the monsters are extremely powerful, when slated they are extrememly weak. They all begin with very low stats, all the same number. But the number varies every time it is slated. For example, I slated the Disk Niton first, and it had all 10s. The next time, it had all 7s. The Omega seems to be the lowest with 3s and 4s.

Disk Niton
Magic Bajarl
Omega
Ghost
Sribble
Stinger

Also, all the monsters begin with their basic techs. The others in the game save are a Dragon/Zuum, Mew/Zuum, and Ape/Zuum. They cannot be slated.
